Buwas Gelisah, Bangun Pagi Mikir Bunga Utang Bulog Rp 10 M/Hari
02 Nov 2019, 04:30 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Lamhot Aritonang

Jakarta - Direktur Utama Perum Bulog Budi Waseso (Buwas) buka-bukaan soal kondisi perusahaan pelat merah tersebut. Bulog yang punya tugas melaksanakan pengadaan Cadangan Beras Pemerintah (CBP), harus mengeluarkan biaya besar baik dari pinjaman maupun kas perusahaan. CBP tersebut diadakan melalui serapan beras petani dalam negeri, maupun impor. Buwas mengungkapkan, untuk pengadaan tersebut butuh biaya triliunan."Kita dapat penugasan dari negara untuk impor beras contohnya, ini kan beras CBP, tapi yang mengimpor dan membeli Bulog, uangnya pinjam, utangnya Bulog. Ini masalah besar, karena nilainya triliunan dan bunganya komersial. Sedangkan CBP ini tidak bisa kita jual belikan kecuali ada penugasan," ungkap Buwas dalam acara Ngopi BUMN, di kantor Kementerian BUMN, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Bahkan menurut Asisten Deputi Usaha Industri Agro dan Farmasi Kementerian BUMN Agus Suharyono mengatakan, Bulog harus berhadapan dengan bunga pinjaman Rp 10 miliar setiap harinya."Setiap bangun pagi Pak Budi ini mikirin bunga. Bunga itu catatan kami hampir Rp 10 miliar, satu hari!" kata Agus di kantor Kementerian BUMN, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Mau tahu informasi selengkapnya? Buwas Restless, Waking Up in the Morning Thinking of Bulog Debt Interest of IDR 10 M / Day
02 Nov 2019, 04:30 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Lamhot Aritonang

Jakarta - Bulog President Director Budi Waseso (Buwas) is open about the condition of the state-owned company. Bulog, which has the task of carrying out the procurement of Government Rice Reserves (CBP), must incur large costs from both loans and company cash. The CBP was held through the absorption of domestic farmers' rice, as well as imports. Buwas revealed, for procurement it requires trillions of costs. "We can assign from the state to import rice, for example, this is CBP rice, but those who import and buy Bulog, borrow money, borrow from Bulog. This is a big problem, because the value is trillions and commercial interest. While CBP cannot be bought or sold unless there is an assignment, "said Buwas at the BUMN Coffee Event, at the BUMN Ministry office, Jakarta, Friday (1/11/2019). Even according to the Assistant Deputy for Agro and Pharmaceutical Industry Business at the SOE Ministry, Agus Suharyono said "Bulog has to deal with a loan interest of Rp. 10 billion every day." Every time you wake up in the morning, Mr. Budi thinks about interest. Our interest is almost Rp. 10 billion, one day! " said Agus at the SOE Ministry office, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
